sentence: Oz with a slim lead, but he's by no means out of the woods,? one Keystone State-based GOP operative told the Morning Report on Monday, adding that the worst-case scenario involves Barnette and state Sen. sentence: Second, the nominee he backed for governor, Doug Mastriano, won the primary and if he wins the election in November, Mastriano would have considerable influence over how the state's presidential election results are handled in 2024 when Trump may be on the ballot as our colleague's Rosalind S. Helderman, Isaac Arnsdorf and Josh Dawsey explain.

title: Trump uses Pa. primary to continue effort to undermine electoral system

sentence: And in Pennsylvania last week, Doug Mastriano, the far-right election denier Trump endorsed, won the gubernatorial primary.
title: 'No one's paying any attention': The week that Republicans ignored Trump's election lies
